Title: Relates to requiring a valid prescription in order to purchase, obtain or use an electronic cigarette; repealer
Summary: Requires a valid prescription from a licensed physician in order to purchase, obtain or use an electronic cigarette.
LawCode: Rpld §1399-n sub 11, add §1399-ddd, amd §§1399-q, 1399-dd, 1399-bb & 1399-cc, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring a prescription from a licensed physician in order to obtain an electronic cigarette; and repealing certain provisions of such law relating thereto
